languages.text: "Соглашусь с Соломоном: оба участника дела виновны. Казнить их".
languages.translation_comment:
Стартует этюд VP_ChoirHostDead
Даргонус +без
Казним обоих, весы уравниваются

traits.locale_text: "Соглашусь с Соломоном: оба участника дела виновны. Казнить их".

languages.translation_comment:
Стартует этюд VP_ChoirHostDead
Даргонус +без
Казним обоих, весы уравниваются

languages.text: "I agree with Solomorne: both parties to the case are guilty. Execute them."
languages.original_text: "Соглашусь с Соломоном: оба участника дела виновны. Казнить их".

traits.locale_text: "I agree with Solomorne: both parties to the case are guilty. Execute them."
"We shall follow the letter of the Lex Imperialis. Both parties to the case are hereby sentenced to death."
"I agree with Solomorne: both parties to the case are guilty. Execute them."
"We shall follow the letter of the Lex Imperialis. Both parties to the case are hereby sentenced to death."
"I agree with Solomorne: both parties to the case are guilty. Execute them."
"I agree with Solomorne: both parties to the case are guilty. Execute them."
"I agree with Solomorne: both parties to the case are guilty. Execute them."
"I agree with Solomorne: both parties to the case are guilty. Execute them."

languages.text: "Ich sehe es wie Solomorne: Beide Parteien sind schuldig. Exekutiert sie."
languages.original_text: "I agree with Solomorne: both parties to the case are guilty. Execute them."

traits.locale_text: "Ich sehe es wie Solomorne: Beide Parteien sind schuldig. Exekutiert sie."
"Wir werden den Buchstaben des Lex Imperia folgen. Beide Parteien werden hiermit zum Tode verurteilt."
"Wir werden den Buchstaben des Lex Imperia folgen. Beide Parteien werden hiermit zum Tode verurteilt."
"Wir werden den Buchstaben des Lex Imperia folgen. Beide Parteien werden hiermit zum Tode verurteilt."

languages.text: « Je suis d'accord avec Solomorne : les deux parties sont aussi coupables l'une que l'autre. Exécutez-les. »
languages.original_text: "I agree with Solomorne: both parties to the case are guilty. Execute them."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis d'accord avec Solomorne : les deux parties sont aussi coupables l'une que l'autre. Exécutez-les. »
« Nous allons suivre la Lex Imperialis à la lettre. Les deux parties sont condamnées à la peine capitale. »
« Nous allons suivre la Lex Imperialis à la lettre. Les deux parties sont condamnées à la peine capitale. »

languages.text: “我同意索罗蒙的观点。本案双方都有罪，把他们统统处决。”
languages.original_text: "I agree with Solomorne: both parties to the case are guilty. Execute them."

traits.locale_text: “我同意索罗蒙的观点。本案双方都有罪，把他们统统处决。”
“我们应当遵循《帝国法典》的相关规定，双方当事人都应当判处死刑。”
“我们应当遵循《帝国法典》的相关规定，双方当事人都应当判处死刑。”

languages.text: «Estoy de acuerdo con Solomorne. Ambas partes son culpables. Ejecútenlos a todos».
languages.original_text: "I agree with Solomorne: both parties to the case are guilty. Execute them."

traits.locale_text: «Estoy de acuerdo con Solomorne. Ambas partes son culpables. Ejecútenlos a todos».
«Seguiremos la Lex Imperialis al pie de la letra. Por la presente, ambas partes del caso quedan condenadas a muerte».
«Seguiremos la Lex Imperialis al pie de la letra. Por la presente, ambas partes del caso quedan condenadas a muerte».

languages.text: 「ソロモーンの意見に賛成だ。訴訟の両当事者は有罪だ。処刑しろ」
languages.original_text: "I agree with Solomorne: both parties to the case are guilty. Execute them."

traits.locale_text: 「ソロモーンの意見に賛成だ。訴訟の両当事者は有罪だ。処刑しろ」

languages.text: "Solomorne'a katılıyorum. İki taraf da cezalı. İdam edilsinler."
languages.original_text: "I agree with Solomorne: both parties to the case are guilty. Execute them."

traits.locale_text: "Solomorne'a katılıyorum. İki taraf da cezalı. İdam edilsinler."
"Lex İmperialis'in kelâmına uyacağız. Davanın iki tarafı da ölüme mahkûm edilmiştir."
